items.sentence: What are some books that you think all of your friends have probably read?
What's something that you'd really like to learn how to do before you die?
It is absurd to believe that young children can run faster than policemen.
That job was not very interesting, but on the other hand it was well paid.
Tom's manager reprimanded him for not treating his customers with respect.
It's an act of treason to sell military secrets to your country's enemies.
I'm sorry that I'm late, but I had a lot of things that needed to be done.
All of the children were crying and some of the teachers were crying, too.
I spent the whole night thinking about all the things that I needed to do.
Tom and Mary said that they weren't planning to get married any time soon.
